text:
A quick shout out to all #MefloquineMassTort, #tafenoquinedossier,
#quinism advocates 
working effectively during these tumultuous times.  

It is working.

As awareness of #Quinoline #neurotoxicity grows the dangers of reckless prescribing of #Chloroquine for #COVID19 lessens. https://t.co/SwcArMRDip
